scripts.build:html: mkdir -p dist && node node_modules/html-minifier/cli.js --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype index.html -o dist/index.html
scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/css && node node_modules/clean-css-cli/bin/cleancss -o dist/css/style.css css/style.css
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/js && node node_modules/terser/bin/terser js/animations.js -o dist/js/animations.js && node node_modules/terser/bin/terser js/theme.js -o dist/js/theme.js && node node_modules/terser/bin/terser js/script.js -o dist/js/script.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:assets
scripts.deploy: echo "Deploying to production..." && npm run build
